title: Camp Pining Hearts
description: The classic Great Northern teen drama following the lives and romances of campers at Camp Pining Hearts. Includes episodes from the divisive reboot New Generations.
quote: It’s the Color War, Paulette. Doesn’t that mean anything to you?
altHero: Paulette, a red-haired girl, and Percy, a blonde boy, in camp clothes
alt2: Percy in camp gear holding poutine
alt3: Paulette and Percy going in for a kiss
